summary: This is a brief email correspondence from July 1, 2021, forwarding a case update document titled 'PC_Unitr_Short_Form_Update.7.2.21.docx' to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. It appears to be an internal communication regarding a case update.

events.title: Case Update Correspondence
events.description: An email was sent forwarding a case update document to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

The communication was directed to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
